1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Clock
4  ( -- * Data type
5    Clock (..), DayCount, Hour, Min, Sec,
6    AbBin,
7    clockBodyToMix,
8
9    -- * Accessor
10    clockFromDhms, clockFromDhm, clockFromDh, clockFromD,
11    clockFromHms,
12    dhmsFromSec, secFromHms,
13
14    -- * Property
15    clockSign, clockDayCount, clockSec,
16    clockPrecision,
17    clockDhms, clockAlter,
18
19    -- * Calculation
20    clockPos, clockNeg,
21    clockCutDay, clockAddDay, clockAddSec,
22    clockAdd, clockSub, clockTimes,
23    clockRangeBy, clockStep,
24  ) where
25
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Date     as D
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message            as Msg
30
31
32-- ----------------------  Data type
33
34data Clock
35    = ClockDhms DayCount Sec    -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of second
36    | ClockDhm  DayCount Sec    -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of minute
37    | ClockDh   DayCount Sec    -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of hour
38    | ClockD    DayCount        -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of day
39      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
40
41type DayCount = Integer
42type Hour     = Int
43type Min      = Int
44type Sec      = Int
45
46clockFromDhms :: DayCount -> Hour -> Min -> Sec -> Clock
47clockFromDhms d h m s = ClockDhms d $ secFromHms (h, m, s)
48
49clockFromDhm :: DayCount -> Hour -> Min -> Clock
50clockFromDhm d h m = ClockDhm d $ secFromHms (h, m, 0)
51
52clockFromDh :: DayCount -> Hour -> Clock
53clockFromDh d h = ClockDh d $ secFromHms (h, 0, 0)
54
55clockFromD :: DayCount -> Clock
56clockFromD = ClockD
57
58clockFromHms :: Hour -> Min -> Maybe Sec -> Clock
59clockFromHms h m (Nothing)  = clockFromDhm  0 h m
60clockFromHms h m (Just s)   = clockFromDhms 0 h m s
61
62-- | Aggregate hour, minute, and second into single second.
63secFromHms :: (Hour, Min, Sec) -> Sec
64secFromHms (h, m, s) = s + 60 * (m + 60 * h)
65
66-- | Decompose second into day-count, hour, minute and second parts.
67dhmsFromSec :: Sec -> (DayCount, Hour, Min, Sec)
68dhmsFromSec sec =
69    let (m', s)   = sec `quotRem` 60
70        (h', m)   = m'  `quotRem` 60
71        (d,  h)   = h'  `quotRem` 24
72    in (toInteger d, h, m, s)
73
74
75-- ----------------------  Property
76
77-- | Sign of clock as @-1@, @0@, @1@.
78clockSign :: Clock -> Int
79clockSign c | day == 0 && sec == 0  = 0
80            | day >= 0 && sec >= 0  = 1
81            | day <= 0 && sec <= 0  = -1
82            | otherwise             = B.bug $ "inconsistent " ++ show c
83            where day = clockDayCount c
84                  sec = clockSec      c
85
86-- | Day-count part of clock.
87clockDayCount :: Clock -> DayCount
88clockDayCount (ClockDhms day _)  = day
89clockDayCount (ClockDhm  day _)  = day
90clockDayCount (ClockDh   day _)  = day
91clockDayCount (ClockD    day)    = day
92
93-- | Second part of clock.
94clockSec :: Clock -> Sec
95clockSec (ClockDhms _ sec)       = sec
96clockSec (ClockDhm  _ sec)       = sec
97clockSec (ClockDh   _ sec)       = sec
98clockSec (ClockD    _)           = 0
99
100clockPrecision :: Clock -> String
101clockPrecision (ClockDhms _ _)   = "sec"
102clockPrecision (ClockDhm  _ _)   = "min"
103clockPrecision (ClockDh   _ _)   = "hour"
104clockPrecision (ClockD    _)     = "day"
105
106clockDhms :: Clock -> (DayCount, Maybe Hour, Maybe Min, Maybe Sec)
107clockDhms clock =
108    case clock of
109      ClockDhms _ _  -> (day + d, Just h, Just m, Just s)
110      ClockDhm  _ _  -> (day + d, Just h, Just m, Nothing)
111      ClockDh   _ _  -> (day + d, Just h, Nothing, Nothing)
112      ClockD    _    -> (day + d, Nothing, Nothing, Nothing)
113    where
114      day             = abs $ clockDayCount clock
115      sec             = abs $ clockSec clock
116      (d, h, m, s)    = dhmsFromSec $ abs sec
117
118clockAlter :: Maybe DayCount -> Maybe Hour -> Maybe Min -> Maybe Sec -> O.Map Clock
119clockAlter d' h' m' s' clock =
120    case clockDhms clock of
121      (d, Just h,  Just m,  Just s)  -> clockFromDhms (d' ! d) (h' ! h) (m' ! m) (s' ! s)
122      (d, Just h,  Just m,  Nothing) -> clockFromDhm  (d' ! d) (h' ! h) (m' ! m)
123      (d, Just h,  Nothing, Nothing) -> clockFromDh   (d' ! d) (h' ! h)
124      (d, Nothing, Nothing, Nothing) -> clockFromD    (d' ! d)
125      _                              -> B.bug "clockAlter"
126    where
127      Just x' ! _  = x'
128      Nothing ! x  = x
129
130
131-- ----------------------  Writer
132
133instance B.MixEncode Clock where
134    mixEncode = clockToMix
135
136clockToMix :: Clock -> B.MixText
137clockToMix = B.mixBracket "|" "|" . clockBodyToMix
138
139clockBodyToMix :: Clock -> B.MixText
140clockBodyToMix c = body $ clockPos c where
141    sign = signToMix $ clockSign c
142    body (ClockDhms day sec)  = sign $ daySecToMix dhmsToMix day sec
143    body (ClockDhm  day sec)  = sign $ daySecToMix dhmToMix  day sec
144    body (ClockDh   day sec)  = sign $ daySecToMix dhToMix   day sec
145    body (ClockD    day)      = sign $ dayToMix day
146
147signToMix :: Int -> O.Map B.MixText
148signToMix (-1) m = B.mixString "-" B.<> m
149signToMix _    m = m
150
151daySecToMix :: (Sec -> (DayCount, B.MixText)) -> DayCount -> Sec -> B.MixText
152daySecToMix secMix day sec =
153    let (d, mx) = secMix sec
154    in case day + d of
155         0  -> mx
156         d2 -> dayToMix d2 B.<> mx
157
158mixColon :: B.Bin B.MixText
159mixColon = B.mixInfix ":"
160
161dhmsToMix :: Sec -> (DayCount, B.MixText)
162dhmsToMix sec = (d, hms) where
163    hms            = D.mix02 h `mixColon` D.mix02 m `mixColon` D.mix02 s
164    (d, h, m, s)   = dhmsFromSec $ abs sec
165
166dhmToMix :: Sec -> (DayCount, B.MixText)
167dhmToMix sec = (d, hm) where
168    hm             = D.mix02 h `mixColon` D.mix02 m
169    (d, h, m, _)   = dhmsFromSec sec
170
171dhToMix :: Sec -> (DayCount, B.MixText)
172dhToMix sec = (d, hm) where
173    hm             = D.mix02 h
174    (d, h, _, _)   = dhmsFromSec sec
175
176dayToMix :: DayCount -> B.MixText
177dayToMix d = B.mixDec d B.<> B.mixString "'"
178
179
180-- ----------------------  Map
181
182-- | Type for abortable binary operator.
183type AbBin a  = a -> a -> B.Ab a
184
185clockMap :: O.Map DayCount -> O.Map Sec -> O.Map Clock
186clockMap f g (ClockDhms d s)  = adjust ClockDhms (f d) (g s)
187clockMap f g (ClockDhm  d s)  = adjust ClockDhm  (f d) (g s)
188clockMap f g (ClockDh   d s)  = adjust ClockDh   (f d) (g s)
189clockMap f _ (ClockD    d)    =        ClockD    (f d)
190
191clockMap2 :: B.Bin DayCount -> B.Bin Sec -> AbBin Clock
192clockMap2 f g (ClockDhms d s) (ClockDhms e t)  = adjustAb ClockDhms (f d e) (g s t)
193clockMap2 f g (ClockDhm  d s) (ClockDhm  e t)  = adjustAb ClockDhm  (f d e) (g s t)
194clockMap2 f g (ClockDh   d s) (ClockDh   e t)  = adjustAb ClockDh   (f d e) (g s t)
195clockMap2 f _ (ClockD    d)   (ClockD    e)    = Right  $ ClockD    (f d e)
196clockMap2 _ _ _ _ = Msg.adlib "clock"
197
198daySeconds :: (Num a) => a
199daySeconds = 86400   -- 24 * 60 * 60
200
201adjustAb :: (DayCount -> Sec -> Clock) -> DayCount -> Sec -> B.Ab Clock
202adjustAb k d s = Right $ adjust k d s
203
204adjust :: (DayCount -> Sec -> Clock) -> DayCount -> Sec -> Clock
205adjust k d s = let (d', s')  = s `divMod` daySeconds
206                   d2        = d + toInteger d'
207               in if d2 < 0 && s' > 0
208                  then k (d2 + 1) (s' - daySeconds)
209                  else k d2 s'
210
211
212-- ----------------------  Calculation
213
214-- | Convert clock to positive clock.
215clockPos :: O.Map Clock
216clockPos = clockMap abs abs
217
218-- | Convert clock to negative clock.
219clockNeg :: O.Map Clock
220clockNeg = clockMap neg neg
221
222neg :: (Ord a, Num a) => a -> a
223neg a | a > 0      = - a
224      | otherwise  = a
225
226-- | Set day-count to zero.
227clockCutDay :: O.Map Clock
228clockCutDay = clockMap (const 0) id
229
230-- | Add day-count.
231clockAddDay :: DayCount -> O.Map Clock
232clockAddDay d = clockMap (+ d) id
233
234-- | Add second.
235clockAddSec :: Sec -> O.Map Clock
236clockAddSec s = clockMap id (+ s)
237
238-- | Calculation of clock plus clock.
239clockAdd :: AbBin Clock
240clockAdd = clockMap2 (+) (+)
241
242-- | Calculation of clock minus clock.
243clockSub :: AbBin Clock
244clockSub = clockMap2 (-) (-)
245
246clockTimes :: Int -> O.Map Clock
247clockTimes m = clockMap (* (toInteger m)) (* m)
248
249
250-- ----------------------  Range
251
252clockRangeBy :: O.Map (DayCount, Sec) -> B.RangeBy Clock
253clockRangeBy step from to = clocks where
254    from'  =  clockTuple from
255    to'    =  clockTuple to
256    clocks =  map fromClockTuple $ B.rangeBy step from' to'
257
258clockStep :: Sec -> O.Map (DayCount, Sec)
259clockStep sec (d, s) = let (d', s') = (sec + s) `quotRem` daySeconds
260                       in (d + toInteger d', s')
261
262clockTuple :: Clock -> (DayCount, Sec)
263clockTuple (ClockDhms d s)  =  (d, s)
264clockTuple (ClockDhm  d s)  =  (d, s)
265clockTuple (ClockDh   d s)  =  (d, s)
266clockTuple (ClockD    d)    =  (d, 0)
267
268fromClockTuple :: (DayCount, Sec) -> Clock
269fromClockTuple (d, s) = ClockDhms d s
